original: Ekberg, Otto Bertil, domänintendent, Dagsnäs, Stora Bjurum, f. 6/7/ 86 i Dagsnäs, Skarab. 1., av godsäg. Lars E. o. Hanna Engström. G. 20 m. Elsa Hård af Segerstad. Barn: Elsa f. 21, g. m. godsäg. Bengt Hes-selmark. St. Levene, Otto 23, Lars 26. ~ Stud:ex. 05, off :ex. 07, lantbrrsk. 09. Und:löjtn. i Livreg. hus. res. 07, löjtn. 14, ryttmäst. 23. Domänint. i Skarab. 1. fr. 25. Äg. o. bruk. Dagsnäs gods o. underlyd. in. Bjärka o. Härlunda s iar i Skarab. 1. Landstingsman 30-47, nämndeman fr. 34, ordf. i komm:st., kommrnd, län. hagelsk:-försifören. o. i län. jordbr :leveraniS-för en. t. 47, Västerigölil. fornminnes-fören. larbetsutsk., led. av hush iisälilsik. förv lutisik. Korr. LHA m. m. RNO, RVO, PatristGM.
translated: Ekberg, Otto Bertil, Domain Supervisor, Dagsnäs, Stora Bjurum, born on July 6th, 1886 in Dagsnäs, Skaraborg County, son of estate owner Lars E. and Hanna Engström. Married in 1920 to Elsa Hård af Segerstad. Children: Elsa (born 1921, married to estate owner Bengt Hesselmark), St. Levene (born 1923), Otto (born 1926). Completed high school in 1905, officer education in 1907, and agricultural studies in 1909. Served as a lieutenant in the Life Guards from 1907, promoted to captain in 1923. Became a Domain Supervisor in Skaraborg County in 1925, owning and managing the Dagsnäs estate as well as Bjärka and Härlunda estates in Skaraborg County. He was a member of the County Council from 1930 to 1947, served as a juror from 1934, was chairman of the municipal committee and county shooting association and served in the county agriculture delivery board until 1947. Member of the Västergötland antiquities society work committee, and member of the Board of Agriculture and other committees. Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star, Officer of the Royal Order of Vasa, and recipient of the Patriotic Society's Large Gold Medal.

awards.name: Royal Order of the North Star
